welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mar del Plata, Argentina! Get ready to experience the beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and delicious seafood that this charming coastal city is known for. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Mar del Plata has to offer.

restaurants.name: London- Cafe-Resto
restaurants.description: London- Cafe-Resto is a diner located in Mar del Plata.
restaurants.address: San Luis 1745 (e/ Jose de San Martín y Bernardino Rivadavia), B7600DTK Mar del Plata, Buenos Aires

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Villa Gesell Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mar Del Plata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mar Del Plata Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
